title: WTB: A few autographed T206 cards
author: ATP

posts.post_title: WTB: A few autographed T206 cards
posts.post_content:
I know, there are several very serious and leading collectors of these on the boards, I have talked to a couple and looked at their amazing collections :-) I have a couple of signed T206 cards right now, Doyle and Marquard, and would like to pick up a few more.  Does anyone have any of the more common players other than those two that they would consider selling?

Thank you.

It is a really fun way to collect T206 cards.  I have dupes of Livingston, Bridwell No Cap, and Doyle Batting, which I would consider trading but they are not for sale at this time.

Good luck!

Hi Paul,
Thanks for the comment.  You have a remarkable collection of these and if you ever do decide to let go of a duplicate, please let me know.  I am hoping there may be a few others out there as well with one or two extra they can part with.
Best,
Jeff
Picked up a new one for me, still looking to add a few more if anyone is willing to part with a signed T206.  Thank you.
